tweet_text:
Why is the ABV so high? Utopias contains a mixture of multiple batches of Samuel Adams’ “extreme beers,” some of which have been aging in wooden bourbon casks for almost 30 years.

This year, the brewing process included 2,000 pounds of cherries. 🍒

https://t.co/JJ7sfTP7qe
